title: Guess Who Turned Up At The Dressing Room To Congratulate The Boys After Their Whitewash? None Other Than Captain Cool MS Dhoni Himself!
text:
Guess Who Turned Up At The Dressing Room To Congratulate India After Whitewash? None Other Than MSD!

Guess Who Turned Up At The Dressing Room To Congratulate India After Whitewash? None Other Than MSD!

MS Dhoni wuit Tests long back , but he had a lingering presence in Ranchi. Captain Cool was in the Indian dressing room.

He was encouraging Shahbaz Nadeem, who took four wickets in his debut Test.

India completed the 3-0 series whitewash and him being there made it all the more special.

twitter/ravi shastri

India took just 12 balls to wrap things up.

Great to see a true Indian legend in his den after a fantastic series win #Dhoni #TeamIndia #INDvsSA pic.twitter.com/P1XKR0iobZ — Ravi Shastri (@RaviShastriOfc) October 22, 2019

Reporter: When in Ranchi, a visit to the local boy's crib beckons? 🤔🤔

Virat: Be our guest 😉😁 #TeamIndia #INDvSA pic.twitter.com/HLdDYX3Pxn — BCCI (@BCCI) October 22, 2019

Don't Miss 518 SHARES 319 SHARES 493 SHARES

Dhoni is currently on a break from international cricket.

With Inputs From TOI.

He was encouraging Shahbaz Nadeem, who took four wickets in his debut Test. India completed the 3-0 series whitewash and him being there made it all the more special. ms dhoni twitter/ravi shastri India took just 12 balls to wrap things up. Look who's here 😍 pic.twitter
